New Records: Italy won in Paris for the first time in 70 years
Key Match Events: Bradley Barcola scored the fastest goal in Euro finals history (13 seconds)
Federico Dimarco scored a stunning volley to equalize for Italy
Davide Frattesi and Giacomo Raspadori scored for Italy to seal a 3-1 win over France
Barış Alper Yılmaz was sent off for Turkey after receiving a second yellow card
Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy named Aaron Ramsey as captain of his first selection as Wales manager
Turkey started without captain and Ballon d'Or nominee Hakan Çalhanoğlu, who has injury concerns and is wrapped in cotton wool on the bench
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy said 'This is worst we're going to be' after Wales drew with Turkey
Italy's coach Luciano Spalletti gave Didier Deschamps a masterclass in counter-attacking football
Kári Tulinius felt mildly optimistic about Wales' performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between Wales and Turkey was a rerun of last autumn's Euro 2024 qualifier that ended Welsh hopes of automatic qualification
The game in Cardiff was a solid start for Craig Bellamy as Wales boss
The teams are out all across Europe, with patriotic folk music blaring out all over the shop
Others: The rain was pelting down in Cardiff, where the match between Wales and Turkey was played
The match between France and Italy was a highly anticipated showdown
The teams are looking to add to their Nations League points
